title: Lead Generation & Outreach Coordinator
salary: TBD - Competitive pay based on experience
job_overview:
Lead Generation & Outreach Coordinator
Location: Fully Remote (PST hours)

About Us:

Since 2012, AquaQuote has been helping customers dive deeper into the water industry with innovative products and expert guidance. We’re growing, and this is a brand-new, long-term role on our team.

Why You’ll Love This Role

Impactful: Own our lead-generation engine and directly drive new business
Autonomy: Work independently from anywhere, with close support from Noemi and Yve
Growth: Join a small, fast-paced team; shape processes and grow with us

What You’ll Do

Prospect & CRM Management
Spend ~2 hrs/day finding new leads
Gather contact info and log everything in CLOSE CRM
 
Email Outreach
Execute cold, warm, inactive & current-customer campaigns using provided templates
Track opens, replies, and follow-ups daily
Loop in Noemi or Yve for calls or relationship building as needed

LinkedIn + Substack Engagement
Comment and connect on our Aquanerds page every day
DM prospects with value offers and log all activity in CLOSE CRM

What We’re Looking For

Experience: 1–2 years in sales, marketing, or lead generation; familiarity with a CRM
Communication: Exceptional written & spoken English
Reliable Setup: Excellent internet connectivity; available during PST business hours
Mindset & Skills: Highly resourceful, adaptable in a fast-paced environment, and naturally detail-oriented

Perks & Benefits

100% remote - work from wherever you’re happiest
Available within PST business hours
Collaborative, supportive team culture
Opportunities for growth as we scale

Apply Today:
Send your resume and a brief cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you're the perfect fit for this role.
